title: Ticket #1033: Quickfix to have the master run kbdd on Windows on an execute node
description: The installer needs a minor modification to have the master start up condor_kbdd. This is a temporary fix until the kbdd's logging can be routed to not use the c:\condor\log directory, as it has insufficient privileges to do so when running under a regular user account. This ends up completely removing any sort of keyboard activity checking. At least this way, the keyboard checking will still work under XP.
